title: Toilet-Bound Hanako-kun Pillowcase Anime Wall Art Bed Set Zipper Body Pillow Case Soft Pillow Cover 150cm x 50cm (59" x 19.6")…
features: SIZE – 59-inch x 19.6 inch(150 cm x 50cm). Pillowcase only, inner is not included. If you are looking for other character’s pillowcase or other fabric pillowcase. Please search Funky Store plus the (character’s name, name of Anime, name of video games or fabric’s name) on Amazon.

MATERIAL– Peach Skin (Polyester), It is moisture absorptive, permeable, and water-resistant, and has the look and style of silk. The fabric is soft, glossy, and smooth. If you are first time to buy anime pillowcase, it is your best option.
HIGH DEFINITION – The Most Advanced Printing Technology Ensures the Best Definition Image of The Pillowcase. [3000x2000ppi (6 million pixels)]

HEAT TRANSFER PRINTING –All kinds of patterns are printed on the pillowcases by heat transfer. Because the printing process is based on the principle of high temperature, it is called heat transfer printing. The printed patterns are rich in layers, bright in color, changeable in variety, small in color difference and good in reproducibility, which can meet the requirements of the designers and are suitable for mass production.
ZIPPER – Hidden Zipper Closure at The Side to Keep Pillow from Sliding Out, And for Style, Comfort and Better Fit.
description: Welcome to Funky Store, we will update new original pillowcases every month, and we are not just selling pillowcase, we also selling mouse pad, keychain, etc.  If you are looking for other character’s pillowcase or other fabric pillowcase. Please search Funky Store plus the keyword (character’s name, name of Anime, name of video games or fabric’s name) on Amazon. For example, when you are looking for Vabao Katsuki Bakugou’s pillowcase, type Funky Store Katsuki Bakugou in search bar of Amazon.  Product features:  We have two fabric in our store, which are peach skin and 2 Way Tricot.  Quality image printed by 3D Digital Sublimation Printing with the finest ink, High definition [3000x2000ppi (6 million pixels)], and quality printing with heat transfer technology. Built-in zip, durable materials, great flexibility, give you best experience
